message:
Welcome

Welcome to the Research IT Resources Guide.

What do you need more information on?

decisions.message:
Data Acquisition

Data can be captured or resides in many formats.

Does the data you need already exist?

Data Curation Experts

There are many places on campus that can help connect you with the data you need. The Jean and Alexander Heard Library, as well as the Data Science Institute and the Center for Digital Humanities can help to connect you with databases already in existence. Also worth consulting with, the Vanderbilt Creative Data Solutions Shared Resource.

No

Do you need to collect your data?

Yes- Data Collection Tools

RedCap

Open Data Kit

Data Curation Specialist

Contact Research IT

Please contact the Research IT Consultant.

Contact Research IT

Please contact the Research IT Consultant.

Contact Research IT

Please contact the Research IT Consultant.

Data Analysis

Data analysis comes in many flavors, the solution depends on the type of outcome or research you are performing. Some of these types of analysis overlap, so choose the answer that best fits your need

What type of analysis do you need?

Contact Research IT

Please contact the Research IT Consultant.

Statistical Analysis

The Vanderbilt Data Science Institute offers workshops, consultations, and bootcamps related to data science and statistical analysis.


The Department of Biostatistics offers workshops and clinics, supporting a wide range of needs, such as the R Clinic, Biostatistics Clinic, Clinical Research Center workshops, the Center for Quantitative Science workshops, as well as the Statistical Computing Series.


The Kennedy Center also offers Biostatistics an Bioinformatics education and consultation in experimental design, data collection and storage, analysis, and interpretation of findings.

Geospatial Analysis Resources

Vanderbilt Spatial Analysis Research Lab

Jean and Alexander Heard Library

Research Software Engineer for Hire

Big Data

Data Science Institute

Contact Research IT

Please contact the Research IT Consultant.

Custom Programming Solutions

Research IT wants to connect you with a programmer that can best fit your need. The selections below do not include all supported languages

What type of programming solution or language do you need support with?

decisions.answer: Web development, e.g., HTML, JavaScript, CSS
decisions.message:
Research Software Engineer for Hire

Contact the Research Software Engineer for Hire

decisions.answer: Software development, e.g., Python, C, C++, Java

Contact Research IT

Please contact the Research IT Consultant.

Training and Education

At Vanderbilt, we have many training resources availble, both free and paid. If you don't see the type of training you need, please suggest it as a topic using the feedback option.

What type of training do you need?

ACCRE

Contact ACCRE for more information.

Data Science Institute

Please contact the Data Science Institute

Training and Resources

Vanderbilt Research IT, Data Science Institute, ACCRE, and the Library offers Software Carpentry bootcamps twice a semester. Unix, Git and Version Control, R, and Python are taught on a rotating basis.


The Data Science Institute offers workshops and bootcamps on R and Python. Please check their website for updated offerings.


For gentle introductions to various digital skills please visit the Vanderbilt Library Digital Scholarship and Communications website.

Training and Resources

Vanderbilt Research IT, Data Science Institute, ACCRE, and the Library offers Software Carpentry bootcamps twice a semester. Unix, Git and Version Control, R, and Python are taught on a rotating basis.


The Data Science Institute offers workshops and bootcamps on R and Python. Please check their website for updated offerings.


For gentle introductions to various digital skills please visit the Vanderbilt Library Digital Scholarship and Communications website.

The Data Science Institute offers workshops and bootcamps on R and Python. Please check their website for updated offerings.


For gentle introductions to various digital skills please visit the Vanderbilt Library Digital Scholarship and Communications website.

Jean and Alexander Heard Library

The library has training and data resources.

Data Storage

Secure Storage

Do you need secure storage (is there a restriction on how your data may be stored and accessed?)?

Secure Storage Options

We have multiple ways of accommodating secure storage needs. Storage options are determined by size and level of security needed for your data.

Have you completed all necessary forms related to contracting your data use agreement? If not please review the requirements from Sponsored Programs.

Data Storage

At Vanderbilt we have some various data storage solutions availble. Many times the solution you need depends on the size and type of data you need to store.

How large is the dataset you need to store?

Vanderbilt Storage Resources

Vanderbilt Box and Vanderbilt One Drive are free storage solutions with a maximum file upload size of 15 GB.

decisions.answer: More than 1 TB but less than 10 TB
